title: Does Riot think that this game is Overwatch?
body: Considering how "Team Deathmatch" the meta is and how damage is just way way over the top these days. I think they are trying to create short matches in the style of a game like "Overwatch" which has always bugged me because one mis-step can usually result in your death.

replies.body: Neither is trying to be neither considering that each is a whole different type of game to begin with. Stop being ignorant.

Considering that these changes that you're talking about *were already implemented long before Overwatch launched,* League is not trying to be Overwatch. If anything, Overwatch is trying to be League.

Prob, people complained about the tank meta and 20 year long games for about the last 2 seasons. 

I still think its funny how people thought overwatch would be the death of League lol
